StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [IsSignedMonthEval]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@MonthEvalID uniqueidentifier
AS BEGIN
SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED
SELECT COUNT(*) As Total FROM USMC.MonthEvalua.on me WHERE ID = @MonthEvalID AND ReviewBy IS NOT NULL And MonthIncrement = ( SELECT MAX(MonthIncrement) FROM USMC.MonthEvalua.on WHERE Mul.MonthEvalua.onID = me.Mul.MonthEvalua.onID ) END
